name: 2023 IEEE International Conference on Image Processing
content: IEEE ICIP is the worldâ€™s largest and most comprehensive technical conference focused on image & video processing and computer vision. This conference will showcase world-class plenary speakers, tutorials, exhibits, special sessions, industry sessions, and a women-in-engineering event that provides an excellent forum for fostering innovation and entrepreneurship. There will be plentiful opportunities to network with the brightest minds in academia and industry from this field. In addition, several events targeting students and young professionals will also be featured at IEEE ICIP 2023.
